name: Robot Hunter VR
description:
VR Shooter Game

It's set in the space and your main task is to kill the enemies and get the highest points on the high scoreboard. The prototype was created as an assignment for my college in Game Design and Technology course.

The game contains data collection for only game enhancement analysis. Examples are: preferred guns, number of shots, number of enemies killed.

Any type of personal data is collected. Also, the nickname registered at the start it's not saved.
